title: Frontend Developer
description: Build and maintain modern UI components using React and TailwindCSS. Collaborate with UX designers and backend engineers.

title: Backend Developer
description: Design and optimize scalable APIs and services. Work with databases and cloud infrastructure.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Build full-stack features from scratch. Maintain code quality with tests and reviews.

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Develop and maintain mobile fitness applications using React Native. Collaborate with designers and product managers.

title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Assist with software development projects, write documentation, and participate in code reviews.
